query:
INSERT INTO healthchecks (check_type, healthy)
                    SELECT 'min_alive_workers_' || $1, true
                    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
                        SELECT 1 FROM healthchecks
                        WHERE check_type = 'min_alive_workers_' || $1 AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '2 minutes'
                    )
                    RETURNING id
